body_html: I opened up a WIP PR over in #764 - still quite a few "interesting" behaviors to investigate/document, but that's the structure of the readme I've written so far :) I anticipate that some of this content will turn to wiki pages soon, but I'd like to get everything written before I go moving it around. Contributions to the refresh-docs branch are more than welcome 💛

body: I opened up a WIP PR over in https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/764 - still quite a few "interesting" behaviors to investigate/document, but that's the structure of the readme I've written so far :) I anticipate that some of this content will turn to wiki pages soon, but I'd like to get everything written before I go moving it around. Contributions to the `refresh-docs` branch are more than welcome 💛
